name: Fateful Mages
description:
Wishlist now to receive a 40% launch discount on release!



Fateful Mages is a relaxing 2d puzzle game where you unlock characters by solving puzzles and uncovering their stories.
When you have discovered the extent of their past, you'll have to make a choice that seals their fate forever.

Features




  • Unlock each character's backgrounds, memories, and dilemmas
  • Based on the character's personality and their past, decide their fate
  • 28 characters to discover
  • Dynamic puzzles of varying challenge
  • Compelling stories with multiple endings
  • Atmospheric soundtrack
  • Can be played with just mouse
  • 10 achievements to unlock (2 hidden)

Developer's note: visuals are not necessarily final and may be subject to change in the final build of the game.
